Reviews.Title: The picture and info incorrect
Reviews.Author: Archie P.
Reviews.Content: Picture shows a camera and all info is about the camera but it is a speaker that looks like a pug.  AZdeals and Amazon processed the refund immediately.  This is not the fault of the dealer.  I gave it a single star -- not because of the dealer or the quality of the pug speaker.  I gave it so that others would not make the same mistake -- want a camera and get a pug speaker.

Reviews.Title: Not a Camera!
Reviews.Author: Paparandy1
Reviews.Content: Picture shows a camera and all info is about the camera but it is a speaker that looks like a pug. AZdeals and Amazon processed the refund immediately. I gave it so that others would not make the same mistake -- want a camera and get a stuffed animal.

Reviews.Title: very angry and dissatisfied - now no x-mas present and rushed to get one !!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dusk Ann
Reviews.Content: The same thing happened to me - I ordered this camera for my daughter for X-mas and got that dancing pug speaker instead - very disappointed - this is the only thing my daughter wanted for x-mas - I contacted amazon right away and a RMA was issued right away and the money was issued back to my CC with in 3 days - what sparks a fire three feet under my butt is that I have left a tleast a dozen message via phone and internet to the seller and have NEVER received a call back from them - will not order from this company/seller again.

ProductInfo.Features:
16MP Digital Camera
2.7" Color Display
4 x Digital Zoom
Video mode
USB 2.0 Interface
2 AAA batteries
wrist strap
and pouch included
ProductInfo.Name: Dancing Pug Speaker
